intro: Nasa moroensis, commonly known as the Moro Island nasa, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its palmate leaves and showy, pink to red flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, often found in moist, shaded environments. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
